message.raw:
Replaced call of depreciated pandas sort() function with sort_index() to ensure forwards compatibility with pandas.
Sort has been removed as of pandas 0.20.
Note that there are still incompatabilities with pandas 0.20 in lyse, so I've set it to check that the version is less than this.

message:
